# Sidetool - AI-Powered Digital Solutions Agency

> We are your design & dev agency ride-or-die partner

## Company Overview
Sidetool is a leading digital agency specializing in AI-powered solutions, custom application development, and business automation. We help businesses transform their operations through cutting-edge technology and innovative design.

### What We Do
We create scalable, efficient, and user-friendly digital products that drive business growth. Our expertise spans from MVP development for startups to enterprise-level automation solutions.

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How can Sidetool help my business?
We specialize in building custom digital solutions that automate workflows, enhance customer experiences, and scale with your business growth. Whether you need an MVP, enterprise automation, or AI integration, we deliver results.

### What technologies do you work with?
We work with modern tech stacks including Bubble.io, FlutterFlow, WeWeb, Retool, and custom development using React, Node.js, and AI/ML frameworks. We choose the best technology for your specific needs.

### How long does a typical project take?
Project timelines vary based on complexity. MVPs typically take 4-8 weeks, while enterprise solutions can range from 2-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during our discovery phase.

### Do you provide ongoing support?
Yes, we offer comprehensive post-launch support, maintenance, and iteration services to ensure your solution continues to meet your evolving business needs.

### How do I get started?
Book a free 15-minute consultation call through our website, or email us at hello@sidetool.co. We'll discuss your project requirements and provide a customized proposal.

## Contact Information

- Location: Global (Remote-First Agency)
